title: fix: move Portkey gateway to custom domain to fix 524 timeouts
author: voodoohop

gist.summary: Moved the AI gateway to a custom domain to support long-running reasoning models and eliminate timeouts.
gist.impact: Users will experience reliable generation for complex tasks and large contexts without interruptions.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee using a magical 'Portkey' (glowing key) to open a stable, glowing portal, representing the new reliable connection for long requests. Time/clocks in the background being paused or extended.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee holding a glowing magical key to open a stable portal. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Magical and reliable atmosphere. Nostalgic but beautiful.
